title.rendered: How Do I Restore a File in Dumpster?

content.rendered:
Through cutting-edge technology Dumpster is able to restore almost any deleted file with 90% accuracy.

To restore a file in Dumpster, tap on the file. Then select the “Restore” icon located on the bottom left hand side bottom, center of the screen. The file should now appear back on your device 一 in the same location it was deleted from.

All photos are restored in chronological order, according to the date it was deleted. And files that are stored within the same folder on your device that were deleted at the same time, will remain grouped together in Dumpster as well.

If you deleted a file before installing Dumpster, you can still restore it by using Deep Scan Recovery!
